create_resume_ai_dialog.step_input_data_optimize_hint_1: Fill in your job position information, including job title, job description, and requirements.
create_resume_ai_dialog.step_input_data_optimize_hint_2: AI will adjust and optimize your resume content accordingly, generating a resume that better fits the job position.
create_resume_ai_dialog.step_input_data_personal_hint_1: Fill in your personal information, including but not limited to summary, experience, education, projects, skills, languages, awards, certifications, interests, etc.
create_resume_ai_dialog.step_input_data_personal_hint_2: AI will organize this fragmented information for you.
